text:
by Phil Erwin

If you have been listening to the news at all, you may have heard about the drug “hydroxychloroquine.” It's now mentioned in daily news briefings from the White House and elsewhere.  #chloroquine #Coronavirus #Plaquenil(hydroxychloroquine) # https://t.co/UDoQKeq0mp https://t.co/CQA2R3bGOO
